headers.value: default-src 'self' https: blob: data:; img-src * data: blob:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://telegram.org https://*.telegram.org https://widget.cloudpayments.ru https://unpkg.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://unpkg.com; connect-src * https://api.maptiler.com; frame-ancestors 'self' https://web.telegram.org https://*.telegram.org;

ignoreCommand: bash -lc 'if [ "$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_REF" != "main" ] && ([[ "$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_REF" == dependabot/* ]] || [[ "$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_REF" == cursor/* ]]); then echo ignore && exit 0; else exit 1; fi'
